resources.string: {\"base\":[{\"name\":\"AMERICANO\",\"type\":\"Before Dinner Cocktail\",\"descr\":\"Mix the ingredients directly in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice-cubes, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.\",\"glass\":\"old-fashioned glass\",\"ice\":\"cubes\",\"toping\":[\"half orange slice\"],\"method\":[\"mix\"],\"ingr\":[\"Campari\",\"Red Vermouth\",\"Soda water\"],\"cl\":[3,3,\"splash\"]},{\"name\":\"ALEXANDER\",\"type\":\"After Dinner Cocktail\",\"descr\":\"Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg\",\"glass\":\"cocktail glass\",\"ice\":\"\",\"toping\":[\"ground nutmeg\"],\"method\":[\"strain\",\"shake\"],\"ingr\":[\"Cognac\",\"Creme de Cacao (brown)\",\"Fresh cream\"],\"cl\":[3,3,3]}]}
